description:
A rugged stainless steel plate for those time you know your food won’t last long enough to need insulated cookware.

  • Tough powder coated finish is grippy and super-scratch resistant
  • Dual layer construction reduces heat transfer, keeping your hands and lap safe from your hot food
  • Slimline design is light, stackable, and dishwasher safe
  • 18/8 food grade stainless steel is the benchmark steel of the high-end culinary world
name: Hydro Flask Camp Plate
